Name: Bulldog
Builder: Swan, Hunter & Wigham Richardson Ltd, Wallsend, United Kingdom
Displacement:
1,360 long tons (1,380 t) (standard)
1,790 long tons (1,820 t) (deep load)
Range: 4,800 nmi (8,900 km; 5,500 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
4 × single 4.7-inch (120 mm) Mk IX guns
2 × single QF 2-pounder (40 mm) Mk II AA guns
2 × quadruple 21-inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
20 × depth charges, 1 rail and 2 throwers
